title: Is it going to be a new era? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe it is. With what’s happening in the world today I can see a war out in the distance. Everybody wants something to change. Some for the better. And others who just seek control and power something needs to be done and I’d give anything to aid this cause. YOUR FREEDOM IS ENDANGERED. And somehow most of us are taking it way to lightly. A future without freedom is no future of mine.
